articles.title: Asian Games 2023 Live Updates, Day 7: Rohan Bopanna-Rutuja Bhosale win India’s 9th gold; Lovlina assures India boxing medal - The Indian Express
articles.description: India at Asian Games 2023 Day 7 Live Updates: Later in the day, the Indian badminton team will take on Korea for a place in the final.
articles.content:
Thakkar's extensive use of AI
Manav Thakkar partnering Manush Shah came very close to upsetting the Korean top pairing in TT at the Asian Games. The 23-year-old Thakkar who hails from Surat has been… [+1469 chars]

articles.title: Watch: Chinese players celebrate Indian shooter's birthday, crowd joins in… - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The shooting arena and then the Chinese shooters celebrated India's Sarabjot Singh's 21st birthday together at the Asian Games.
articles.content: Sports bridges gaps. Sports knows no boundaries. Sports is the ultimate unifier. These may seem superfluous or overused phrases at times but on most occasions, they turn out to be true. Just in the c… [+2684 chars]
